items.sentence: Are you certain that it was Tom who told Mary to do that?
Tom realized that he wasn't likely to be able to do that.
Tom hoped Mary would find it in her heart to forgive him.
Why didn't you tell me that you weren't going to do that?
I don't have any intention of meddling into your affairs.
The defendant was found not guilty by reason of insanity.
Do you think there's a chance that Tom is actually right?
Tom knew Mary had told everyone she was going to do that.
Don't forget to tell Mary she needs to do that this week.
You don't really believe Tom did that on purpose, do you?
